SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order O WHERE 1=1 AND O.ACTIVE = 1
AND O.CREATED_AT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND O.CREATED_AT < STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 DAY
AND O.APPROVED = #{filter}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order O WHERE O.FRANCHISE_CODE = #{franchiseCode} AND O.ACTIVE = 1
AND O.CREATED_AT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND O.CREATED_AT < STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 DAY
AND O.APPROVED = #{filter}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_order O WHERE O.FRANCHISE_CODE = #{franchiseCode} AND CAST(O.ORDER_CODE AS CHAR) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND O.ACTIVE = 1
AND O.CREATED_AT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND O.CREATED_AT < STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 DAY
AND O.APPROVED = #{filter}

SELECT count(DISTINCT o.ORDER_CODE) FROM tbl_order o LEFT JOIN tbl_order_item oi ON o.ORDER_CODE = oi.ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN tbl_item i ON oi.ITEM_CODE = i.ITEM_CODE WHERE o.FRANCHISE_CODE = #{franchiseCode} AND o.ACTIVE = 1 AND i.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND o.CREATED_AT >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND o.CREATED_AT < STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') + INTERVAL 1 DAY
